resources.string:
Copilot helps users efficiently send messages to multiple contacts using selected messengers
This feature is designed to assist individuals who may have difficulty performing repetitive tasks on their device.
How it works:
1. Add or import your contacts.
2. Compose and schedule messages.
3. Let the app handle the sending process.
This service reduces manual steps and supports users with limited mobility or dexterity by automating message sending in a secure and user-controlled way.
